body_html:
I have encountered the same issue too.

Running up-to-date ArchLinux (rolling release, no version numbers), using their python-pytorch-cuda 0.3.1-2 package, which uses cudnn 7.1.1-1 and python 3.6.

Same result and error message as @leomao . Writing here since issue is still tagged "needs reproduction". For me, I get the error for vanilla nn.RNN also.

body:
I have encountered the same issue too. 

Running up-to-date ArchLinux (rolling release, no version numbers), using their `python-pytorch-cuda 0.3.1-2` package, which uses `cudnn 7.1.1-1` and `python 3.6`.

Same result and error message as @leomao . Writing here since issue is still tagged "needs reproduction".  For me, I get the error for vanilla nn.RNN also.
